name: PHLivePhotoBadgeOptions
desc: Options for the semantic use and display style of icons for badging Live Photo assets, used by the livePhotoBadgeImage(options:) method.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates Live Photo badge options from a raw value.

items.name: static var liveOff: PHLivePhotoBadgeOptions
items.desc: Return an icon for identifying assets whose additional Live Photo content is disabled.

items.name: static var overContent: PHLivePhotoBadgeOptions
items.desc: Return a variant icon for use on a variable background such as an animating Live Photo view.
